description: A figure sits cross-legged playing a flute before a small snake rising from a basket. A colossal shadow towers behind the figure, revealing the actual, immense scale of the creature casting it. The figure's startled expression indicates a sudden realization of the vast disproportion between the visible snake and its overwhelming shadow. The scene juxtaposes the expected outcome of snake charming with a surprising and potentially dangerous reality. This highlights an absurd disparity in size and power.
